section.p: You tell the high priest that you wish to renounce the worship of Nagil. He summons four acolytes bearing a pall and asks you to lie on it so that they can carry you outside. When you ask what that symbolizes, he gives a faint shrug and says, ‘You must draw your own conclusion.’

Do you want to reconsider?
If you are determined to renounce your faith,
delete Nagil from the God box
on your Adventure Sheet. You must lose any outstanding resurrection arrangements, and also the title Chosen One of Nagil if you have it.
